song.title: The Sign Of Fate
song.info:
1.The Sign Of Fate (2:07)
Legions from the north came to invade our southern lands Drawn by lust for blood and gold, under a madman's command
Overpowered and defeated, our wise men soon cried Tears of despair flowing at the sight of all who'd died
But far away, beneath crimson skies, Four brothers stood up and swore to rise
Revenge from damnation Suffer in oblivion From the scarlet flows and mourning shadows, Freedom and life would rise again...
